# The Lady's Car Lot

Premium luxury car rentals in Lagos, Nigeria. Elite fleet including exotic sports cars, premium SUVs, and executive chauffeur services.

## Core Features
- Luxury Car Fleet (Lamborghini, Ferrari, Mercedes-Benz, Range Rover, etc.)
- Premium Chauffeur Services
- Luxury Car Rentals for Weddings, Events, and Executive Travel
- Professional and Reliable Service in Lagos

## Tech Stack
- Frontend: React, Vite, Framer Motion
- Styling: Vanilla CSS (Modern aesthetic)
- Deployment: Web-ready

## Contact & Location
- Location: Lagos Island, Lagos, Nigeria
- Website: https://theladyscarlot.com/
- Available 24/7 for booking luxury experiences.

## SEO Metadata
- Title: The Lady's Car Lot | Luxury Car Rentals in Lagos, Nigeria
- Description: Experience premium luxury car rentals in Lagos. From exotic sports cars to executive SUVs, arrive in style with The Lady's Car Lot.
